properties.name: powerjob.worker.app-name
properties.description: Name of application. Register in PowerJob-console to prevent error.

properties.name: powerjob.worker.enable-test-mode
properties.description: Whether to enable test mode. In test mode, worker will not connect to server.

properties.name: powerjob.worker.max-result-length
properties.description: Max length for {@link ProcessResult}#msg, result longer than this property will be truncated.

properties.name: powerjob.worker.server-address
properties.description: PowerJob-server node(s) address. Ip:port or domain, multiple addresses should be separated with comma

properties.name: powerjob.worker.store-strategy
properties.description: Local store strategy, disk or memory

properties.name: powerjob.worker.max-appended-wf-context-length
properties.description: Max length of appended workflow context. Appended workflow context that is longer than the value will be ignore.
